offersAndSales.title: Offers & Sales
offersAndSales.description: Create offers and manage sales orders

whatIsWorkflow.q: What is the main workflow of this application?
whatIsWorkflow.a: The workflow follows: Create an Offer → Convert to Sale Order → Generate Service Order (for services) → Schedule Jobs → Dispatch to technicians → Log time, expenses and materials.

howToNavigate.q: How do I navigate between modules?
howToNavigate.a: Use the sidebar menu to access Dashboard, Contacts, Offers, Sales, Service Orders, Planner, and other modules. Each module handles a specific part of your business workflow.

whatAreDailyTasks.a: Daily Tasks show your scheduled dispatches for the day. You can view assigned jobs, log time and expenses, and update job status directly from this view.

howToCreateOffer.q: How do I create a new offer?
howToCreateOffer.a: Go to Offers → Click 'New Offer' → Add customer details → Add articles (materials and/or services) → Set pricing and discounts → Save or send the offer.

howToAddArticles.q: How do I add articles to an offer?
howToAddArticles.a: In the offer editor, click 'Add Item' → Search for articles by name or code → Select the article → Adjust quantity and pricing if needed.

howToConvertToSale.q: How do I convert an offer to a sale?
howToConvertToSale.a: Open the accepted offer → Click 'Convert to Sale' → Review the details → Confirm. This creates a Sale Order and, if services are included, generates a Service Order automatically.

whatHappensAfterConversion.q: What happens when I convert an offer to a sale?
whatHappensAfterConversion.a: A Sale Order is created. If the offer contains service items, a Service Order is automatically generated with Jobs for each service that needs to be performed.

howToSetDiscount.q: How do I apply discounts to an offer?
howToSetDiscount.a: In the offer editor, you can set a discount percentage or fixed amount at the line item level or as an overall offer discount in the totals section.

whatIsServiceOrder.a: A Service Order is created when a Sale Order contains services. It contains Jobs that need to be scheduled and performed by technicians in the field.

howToViewJobs.q: How do I view jobs in a Service Order?
howToViewJobs.a: Open the Service Order → Navigate to the 'Jobs' tab → You'll see all jobs with their status, assigned technician, and scheduled dates.

howToUpdateJobStatus.q: How do I update a job's status?
howToUpdateJobStatus.a: Open the job → Change the status dropdown (Pending, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled) → Save. You can also update status from the Planner or Daily Tasks view.

howToLinkEquipment.q: How do I link equipment/installation to a job?
howToLinkEquipment.a: In the job details, use the 'Installation' field to search and select the customer's equipment. This links the job to a specific piece of equipment for tracking.

howToScheduleJob.q: How do I schedule a job to a technician?
howToScheduleJob.a: Go to Planner → Drag the unscheduled job to a technician's timeline → Drop it at the desired date/time. This creates a Dispatch.

whatIsDispatch.a: A Dispatch is created when a Job is scheduled to a user via the planning board. Technicians see their dispatches in Daily Tasks and can log time and expenses against them.

howToReschedule.q: How do I reschedule a dispatch?
howToReschedule.a: In the Planner, drag the dispatch to a new time slot or different technician. You can also open the dispatch and edit the scheduled date/time directly.

howToViewTechSchedule.q: How do I view a technician's schedule?
howToViewTechSchedule.a: Go to Planner → Select the technician from the list → Their scheduled dispatches appear on the timeline. Use the date picker to navigate between days/weeks.

howToLogTime.q: How do I log time against a dispatch?
howToLogTime.a: Open the dispatch → Go to 'Time' tab → Click 'Add Entry' → Enter start/end time or duration → Add notes if needed → Save.

howToAddExpense.q: How do I add an expense?
howToAddExpense.a: Open the dispatch or service order → Go to 'Expenses' tab → Click 'Add Expense' → Select expense type → Enter amount and details → Attach receipt if required → Save.

howToLogMaterials.q: How do I log materials used on a job?
howToLogMaterials.a: Open the dispatch → Go to 'Materials' tab → Click 'Add Material' → Search for the article → Enter quantity used → Save. This updates inventory automatically.

whereToSeeTimesheet.q: Where can I see my timesheet?
whereToSeeTimesheet.a: Go to Time & Expenses → Select the date range → View your logged hours organized by day, dispatch, or project. You can export this data for reporting.

howToCreateArticle.q: How do I create a new article?
howToCreateArticle.a: Go to Articles → Click 'New Article' → Enter name, code, description → Set as Material or Service → Add pricing → Set inventory settings if applicable → Save.

differenceMaterialService.q: What's the difference between a Material and a Service?
differenceMaterialService.a: Materials are physical items that affect inventory (parts, equipment). Services are labor or work performed (installation, repair) that generate Jobs when sold.

howToCheckStock.q: How do I check stock levels?
howToCheckStock.a: Go to Inventory → View current stock levels for all materials → Use filters to find low stock items → Click an item to see movement history.

howToAdjustInventory.a: Go to Inventory → Select the article → Click 'Adjust' → Enter the adjustment quantity and reason → Save. Adjustments are logged for auditing.

whatIsInstallation.a: An Installation represents a piece of equipment at a customer location. Jobs are linked to installations to track service history and maintenance for specific equipment.

howToCreateInstallation.q: How do I create a new installation?
howToCreateInstallation.a: Go to Installations → Click 'New Installation' → Select customer → Enter equipment details (type, serial number, location) → Save.

howToViewServiceHistory.q: How do I view service history for equipment?
howToViewServiceHistory.a: Open the Installation → Go to 'History' tab → View all past jobs, dispatches, and work performed on this equipment in chronological order.

howToScheduleMaintenance.q: How do I schedule preventive maintenance?
howToScheduleMaintenance.a: Open the Installation → Go to 'Maintenance' tab → Set up maintenance schedule → The system will automatically create jobs when maintenance is due.

howToChangePassword.q: How do I change my password?
howToChangePassword.a: Go to Settings → Account → Click 'Change Password' → Enter current password → Enter and confirm new password → Save.

howToUpdateProfile.q: How do I update my profile information?
howToUpdateProfile.a: Go to Settings → Profile → Edit your name, email, phone, and other details → Upload a profile photo if desired → Save changes.

howToSetNotifications.a: Go to Settings → Notifications → Choose which events trigger notifications → Select notification method (email, in-app) → Save preferences.

howToSwitchLanguage.q: How do I switch the application language?
howToSwitchLanguage.a: Go to Settings → Preferences → Select your preferred language (English/French) → The interface will update immediately.
